department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Blast chiller chiller replacement at Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre
description: Replacing the chiller at Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-food Canada.
duration_in_months: The contract was supposed to last from 02-28-2024 to 04-17-2025
full_summary:
### EF944-241009 Chiller Replacement [Expired] 
#### Solicitation No.: WS4241348486 
#### Amendment No.: 3 
#### Notice Publication Date: January 29, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: March 14, 2024, at 14:00:00
#### Solicitation Date: March 4, 2024
#### Expected Contract Start Date: February 28, 2024
#### Expected Contract End Date: April 17, 2025


**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)


**Regions of Delivery:** Saint-Hyacinthe, Canada
**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
**Contact:** Cloutier, Annabelle, SPAC/PSPC, Email: [annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)


**Notice Description:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the replacement of chillers at the Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre on behalf of the Agriculture and Agri-food Canada. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation document. Please refer to the link below for the solicitation document:

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18644104?extsite=MTg2NDQxMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== 

**Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada**, as part of its research and development activities, requires the replacement of the existing chillers at the **Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre**. The bid period was open for competitive proposal on **March 14, 2024**.  For more information on the solicitation and requirements of the project, please refer to the notice section.  We expect to replace the existing chillers and built new ones for the long term use. We expect to budget CAD$\_\_1M$ for this project, breakdown to as follows: 

- The lowest
